product.name: Maybelline Superstay Better Skin Foundation
product.description: The Maybelline Superstay Better Skin Foundation reduces the appearance of spots, bumps, dullness and redness to give you brighter, smoother and more even skin. Features:Longwear that improves skin every minute you're in it: brighter, smoother and more even.With micro-flex technology and the antioxidant power of Actyl-C.Ideal for sensitive skin. Good for all skin types. Medium to full coverageHow to Apply: Apply evenly to your face and blend with your fingers.
